header.content: Do not forget to click to "Save" button!

favicon.label: Image favicon
favicon.info: Will be scaled down to 32 x 32px

logo_image_desktop.label: Default logo
logo_image_desktop.info: Upload image: png, jpg or gif file (90 x 20px recommended)

logo_svg.label: Logo SVG
logo_svg.info: Upload your SVG logo to [Files](/admin/settings/files) to get the URL.

settings.notification_info: Leave blank to use your original page titile

language_rtl.label: ISO language code support RTL
language_rtl.info: Leave blank if you want to apply to all languages. Separate your ISO codes if you want apply to some one languages ar; fa; ku; pa; sd

paragraph_currency.content: Cart and checkout prices always show currency codes. Example: $1.00 USD.

paragraph.content: The Fluid container provides a larger width container than the site's default width.

background_gradient.label: Background gradient
background_gradient.info: No color chosen Background gradient replaces background where possible.

transparent_mobile.label: Transparent header on mobile
transparent_mobile.info: Only works if you have checked the settings: "Enable transparent on top" or "Enable transparent header" above.

search_for.label: Search for :
search_for.info: "Search all" only work when you selected Predictive search suggest in Predictive search type setting

free_shipping_progress_bar.label: Show on minicart and cart page

shipping_rate.label: Free shipping rates
shipping_rate.info: Make sure that you have properly configured your shipping rates.

gift_wrap.label: Product Gift wrap
gift_wrap.info: Gift wrap needs to be set up as a product.

cart_shipping_rates_days.label: Show delivery days for estimate shipping

show_message_add_to_wishlist.label: Show message add to wishlist when remove cart item

redirect_page.label: Visit the wishlist page and remove the item

use_stock_notify.label: Use Stock notification form
use_stock_notify.info: If you use the stock notification form, when a product is out of stock, this function will appear and when the user registers, an email notification will be sent to your email store. To view or change your email store from your Shopify admin, click Settings, then click Store details.

show_product_action_on_mobile.label: Show product action on mobile
show_product_action_on_mobile.info: Show actions like: add cart, wishlist on mobile.

text_scrolling_sale.info: * [percent_sale] is the variable name that will be automatically replaced, you must not change it. But you can change it position in the text

enable_sw_only_product_detail.label: Enable only product detail and quickview

option_name_color.info: Define the name of color option. Separate by a comma. Eg. Color,Colour

option_name_size.info: Define the name of size option. Separate by a comma. Eg. Size,Taglia

promotion_content.label: Promotion content
promotion_content.info: [promotion_code] is the variable name that will be automatically replaced, you must not change it. But you can change it position in the text

bf_desc.info: * [discount_code] is the variable name that will be automatically replaced, you must not change it. But you can change it position in the text

enable_cart_terms_conditions.label: Enable page cart and mini cart

enable_loading_img.label: Enable page cart and mini cart

loading_img.label: Enable loading image
loading_img.info: Upload image: png, jpg or gif file (90 x 20px recommended)

custom_width.label: Custom width
custom_width.info: Only active when enable custom width

popups.name: Dropdowns and pop-ups
popups.paragraph: Affects areas like navigation dropdowns, pop-up modals, and cart pop-ups.

favicon.label: Favicon image
favicon.info: Will be scaled down to 32 x 32px

settings.paragraph: Cart and checkout prices always show currency codes. Example: $1.00 USD.

reset_color_mb.label: Reset color scheme setting on mobile

section_header.info_logo_svg: If you upload both icon images and SVG icons, the SVG icons will be used.
section_header.heading: Heading

images_banner.title: Images banner
images_banner.info_show_banner: Banner will be hidden on Tablet and mobile.

reveal_on_scroll.label: Scroll-based content reveal
reveal_on_scroll.info: * Animations are initially hidden and only activate when the corresponding section enters the user's viewport while scrolling if this setting is actived.

custom_ratio.label: Custom ratio
custom_ratio.info: Custom ratio only works If you select Custom in the Aspect ratio setting.

carousel__bullets.label: Show dot both on desktop and mobile

custom_height.height_info: Only works when selected custom height

video.local_text: If you upload both video url and local video, the local video will be used.

blocks.description: Display only on desktop, it will be removed in menu mobile

menu_item.label: Menu item
menu_item.info: Enter the name of the level 1 menu to display the mega menu dropdown. Please distinguish between uppercase and lowercase letters. [Learn more.](https://blueskytechco.gitbook.io/alukas-shopify/header-group/header)

eb_vertical_menu.label: Show vertical menu
eb_vertical_menu.info: The vertical menu Only show beside the slideshow when you choose header layout 4

custom_height.info: Work only when choose Custom height in Slide height setting

custom_liquid.label: Custom liquid
custom_liquid.info: Add app snippets or other Liquid code to create advanced customizations.

collection_custom.label: Custom width images
collection_custom.info: Custom width images only works with designs that have text below the image.

paragraph.content: You should be familiar with web design languages such as HTML and CSS.

ig_image_show.label: Image type show
ig_image_show.info: *If you choose type instagram upload manual please add a block and upload the image

ig_ac.label: User's photos via Instagram API
ig_ac.info: Add Instagram Access Token Key here.

overlay_info.info: Only works when you selected "Overlay image" in the Type of Content setting

reset_info.info: To activate this function, you must select the " Content below image on mobile " option above

image_mobile.info: Leave blank to inherit from desktop (430 x 245px recommended)

background_gradient.label: Content background gradient
background_gradient.info: Background gradient replaces background where possible.

text_bellow_mobile.label: Show text bellow mobile (* Apply to design Text overlay image)

tab_name.label: Tab name
tab_name.info: Leave it blank to use collection name

header.popup_setting_info: Only works when you selected Popup in the Video show as setting and use YouTube or Vimeo videos
header.background_setting_info: Only works when you selected Background in the Video show as setting

paragraph.content: This option will not work with collections containing more than 1000 products .[How to setup?](/admin/menus)

type_product.info: Type is list defaut show 3 products

image.info: Upload image: png, jpg or gif file(1920 x 200px recommended)

include_margins.label: Make section margins the same as theme

image_padding.label: Use original image ratio
image_padding.info: Select if you don't want your image to be cropped.

video_url.label: URL
video_url.info: Video plays in a pop-up if the section contains other blocks.
video_url.placeholder: Use a YouTube or Vimeo URL

image_padding.label: Use original image ratio
image_padding.info: Select if you don't want your image to be cropped.

description.label: Video alt text
description.info: Describe the video for customers using screen readers. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/themes/theme-structure/theme-features#video-block)

show_description.label: Show collection description from the admin

show_view_all.label: Enable "View all" if collection has more products than shown

show_rating.label: Show product rating
show_rating.info: To display a rating, add a product rating app. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/themes/theme-structure/theme-features#featured-collection-show-product-rating)

enable_quick_buy.label: Enable quick add button
enable_quick_buy.info: Optimal with popup or drawer cart type.

show_dynamic_checkout.label: Show dynamic checkout buttons
show_dynamic_checkout.info: Using the payment methods available on your store, customers see their preferred option, like PayPal or Apple Pay. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/using-themes/change-the-layout/dynamic-checkout)

featured_image_info.content: If you include a link in social media posts, the pages featured image will be shown as the preview image. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/images/showing-social-media-thumbnail-images)

title_info.content: A store title and description are included with the preview image. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/promoting-marketing/seo/adding-keywords#set-a-title-and-description-for-your-online-store)

paragraph.content: To display a rating, add a product rating app. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/themes/theme-structure/theme-features#featured-product-rating)

hide_variants.label: Hide unselected variants media on desktop

title.label: Heading
title.info: Leave blank to use menu heading

header__1.info: Go to "Theme settings " to update these information.

settings.paragraph: Use this block to make a spacing between columns

header__1.info: Subscribers added automatically to your accepted marketing customer list. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/customers/manage-customers)

header__2.info: To display your social media accounts, link them in your theme settings.

header__4.info: To add a country/region, go to your [payment settings.](/admin/settings/payments)

header__6.info: To add a language, go to your [language settings.](/admin/settings/languages)

show_border_top.label: Show border top on home page

show_border_top_inner.label: Show border top on inner page

has_bg.label: Add spacing when there is a background color

remove_on_inner_page.label: Remove default spacing on the inner pages

enable_sticky_header.label: Enable sticky header

adapt_height_first_image.info: Overwrites image banner height setting when checked.

button_label_2.label: Second button label
